items.title: Verification Methodology Overview
items.headline: Maven Silicon
objectives_summary: This Verification Methodology course starts with a good overview and explains the need of verification.
Explains the functional verification process, testbench architecture and constraint random coverage driven verification methodology in detail.

Explains all the verification methodologies like linting, code coverage, functional coverage, verification planning & management and Assertion Based verification and gives you a good exposure how we verify the RTL design thoroughly.
